# subscriptionID

**Instance Property**

The subscription identifier for the associated database.

## Declaration

```swift
var subscriptionID: CKSubscription.ID?
```

## Discussion

By default, a sync engine attempts to discover an existing subscription for the synced database. If one isn’t found, the engine creates an internal [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKDatabaseSubscription] and uses that to receive notifications about remote record changes.

If you require the sync engine to use a specific database subscription, assign that subscription’s identifier to this property. Doing so enables your app to be backwards compatible if you’re migrating to [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKSyncEngine-5sie5] from a custom CloudKit sync implementation.

The default value is `nil`.

## Managing attributes

- **automaticallySync**: A Boolean value that determines whether the engine syncs automatically.
- **database**: The associated database.
- **stateSerialization**: The sync engine’s serialized state.

items.description: A Boolean value that determines whether the engine syncs automatically.
